person.persName: James Crockett Sayers (Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kenton County native. Son of Henry Sayers and Elizabeth Sayers. Married to Mary C. Sayers. Father of J. Fenley Sayers, Eugene B. Sayers, Charlie W. Sayers, and William H. Sayers. Resident of Kenton County in 1850. Farmer in Kenton County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in 1860. First lieutenant and quartermaster from August 1862 to December 1862.
